column2: Your Chancellor is presently working to fabricate a claim in your name. Selecting this will call them to you, so that you may attempt to push for success in their work.
Abdicate your position to your current heir.
You place a want add for a Court Jester, who shall respond?
You have one or more locations in your realm where you can go shopping.
Will the arcane arts raise you to new levels, or result in your downfall?
Keeping a slave removes them from your prison and adds them to your court proper. They're still a branded slave, and as such you can later sell them if you so choose.
Once a slave has been branded, you're now able to sell them. The value of a sold slave is determined by the training that they completed, as well as some other potential desirable traits.
Branding a slave indicates that they've been successfully trained in at least one category, and are now eligible for additional decisions, such as adding them to your own court or selling them.
Opens an event where you may select the desired training category for the slave.
Your prisoners are at your mercy. Enslaving them is an option that is available to you.
Obtain the services of a woman or man who provides 'morale boosting' services.
Make some money and potentially have fun while doing it. Win-win.
Your slave works as a whore, and as such has the opportunity to make money. Since a slave has no need for personal possessions, as they're your property, you can collect what money they've earned.

Some mages can provide useful services to their liege when consulted with. \n  Many services require the mage to gather energies to perform a task. The energy available is pulled from the liege's resources, either piety, prestige, or wealth, and some may result in negative values.

Turning someone into a frog is considered a curse. They are considered incapable and a regent is appointed to handle their affairs if applicable. They also cannot marry and cannot inherit, as no one wants to have anything to do with such a cursed individual.
As a ruler you can attempt to talk someone into giving up their whoring ways. It isn't guaranteed to work, as some folks simply become part of that lifestyle. Especially if they've certain traits.
Donkey shows weren't invented by Mexico.
The opportunity to spend intimate time with Hermione seems like a rarity sometimes. I welcome opportunities like this to steal away together.
Visit the arena where you can witness impressive matches of skill, where fortunes are made and lost, and where champions rise and losers may perish.
Hermione has learned how to remove lustful or hedonistic traits from people. If they don't already have those traits, they'll become chaste. If they're already chaste, they'll become celibate.

You attempt to have your target drink the love potion. And while many seek love potions, few wish to be on the receiving end of them, so there is a chance the attempt fails. The greater the difference in Intrigue, the better the chance for success.
Spend time with your lover, spouse, or concubine. Why wait for the vanilla game to decide when you'll be getting together? Seize your love life today!

There are times where for no apparent reason CK2 will not make a child of your bloodline, especially as a female ruler, even if you've made arrangements for your children to be of your bloodline. This will pull them back into your bloodline, not as bastards, but legitimate heirs.
Choose to start with a special trait or character modifier due to one of the mods you have installed.
The character allows the immortal power within them to ascend and leave their body behind. Leaving their body mortal once more.
Your dream seems more real this time, more... familiar.
Provides your starting ruler with either the Futanari or Trap trait, depending on their gender.
My great grandmother came from the Far East. Her bloodline seems to have resurfaced within me.
I was bitten by a creature, drained of my life, and awoke as a vampire.
I've found an ideal world where I can make my mark, for the clan and for glory!
Most view us as little more than things of legend. Are we doomed to fade away?
Kitsune are strong spirits, strong enough to be hunted by those who lust for power.
The almighty has spoken to me. I shall rule with his divine blessing.
Some say I should not exist, for I am the spawn of an unholy union. I say I am much more than that.

Through the wisdom and power that Mother Lilith has bestowed upon me, I have the ability to fool and manipulate even the being known as Death. In doing so, my target now will not be sought by Death through natural causes, less the person willingly moves on themselves.

You've identified a potential target to be whisked away and brought back to your dungeons. A dangerous task that will require an investment of funds and the realization that it could not only fail, yet cost you the live of your Spymaster who would be handling the task.
A crude term for a crude ability. This is an assault most vile. Widely considered to be worse than either rape or murder. Your target will resist if they're able, so it's best to plan accordingly.

I've been asked to provide the means for a trap, to obtain a less 'manly' portrait. Since tampering with portrait dna isn't an option, I offer this solution, which will assign a random custom portrait. If you don't like what you get, remove it and then try again.
This targeted decision allows you to remove the custom portrait trait. This will remove the custom static image and instead revert back to the default CK2 portrait system.
At the Wizard rank in the society, an individual can decide to pursue the path of becoming a true mage, or they can opt out and simply pursue the higher learning aspects of the society.
Place a call to one of the Chosen of Lilith to join your court.
An intrigue decision where you can invite a fellow society member to your court.
Every member of the Wizards College can benefit in their studies with the help of a laboratory to help them study the arcane.
Sacrifice the prisoner to Mother Lilith.
Right-click on the portrait of one of your prisoners, to sacrifice them to Lilith.
Begins the recruitment process to determine if the person is both a good fit, and if they're interested in joining.
Right click on the portrait of a prospective member to begin the recruitment evaluation process.
Begins the recruitment process to determine if the person is both a good fit, and if they're interested in joining.
Right click on the portrait of a prospective member to begin the recruitment evaluation process.
The beautiful daughter of a cobbler shared some points of interest should I wish to travel and visit again.
This is a customized 'Spend time with' decision that has special events for the player and Gaston.

For sparing the life of the Beast, and keeping his curse alive, he can leave his lands once a decade to strike out at a target. This is not a guaranteed success, and the Beast may be slain. The risk level varies on the station of the individual.
This is a customized 'Spend time with' decision that has special events for the player and Belle.
Legend says the lamp holds a Genie. As long as it hasn't been set free, I should be able to summon it with a little rubbing.
Turn one who is of simple mind and weak will, to be your willing servant.
Feed on thralls or your lovers for a health boost. Does not kill the target.
A Vampire attempts to weaken the mind or will of the target. Preparing them to potentially be exploited further.
The target werekin will consume the potion and become a full blooded werewolf.\n Only useful on werekin.
While generally solitary creatures, a vampire sometimes desires company, often choosing a favored thrall or a loved one to become a vampire as well.
Choosing to not use a safe feeding source - or simply not having one - you decide to strike out into the night in search of prey.
I shall dive into the secrets of Diablerie, where knowledge and power await.
The player should never see this decision, as it is intended to be Fenris specific. Fenris hunts once every other year.
Fenris only event to bolster his court with his kind.
It is vital for werewolves to participate in the hunt as they fight the hunger within.
The player should never see this decision, as it is intended to be Vladimir specific. Vladimir hunts once a year.
This is the campaign start, where you meet with Fenris and show your true self to the world (obtain the werewolf trait).
A new courtier has arrived, and there is something very alluring about them.
